speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm fine, but I prefer not to discuss anything regarding debts.

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your concerns. I'm calling about your overdue balance with our company.

speaker: Customer
text: I've already requested to have my number added to the do not call list.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the inconvenience. Let me check and ensure your number is marked.

speaker: Customer
text: I just want to be left alone. Please make sure it’s done.

speaker: Agent
text: Absolutely, I’ll make sure it's processed right away.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you. I really don’t want to receive calls anymore.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, and I have confirmed your number is now on the do not call list.
